name: Jetpack Fighter
description:
SMASH EVIL ROBOTS!

Slash your way to victory in the fast action, high-flying Jetpack Fighter!


DASH through the skyscrapers of Mega City

SMASH EVIL ROBOTS and leave a trail of destruction in your wake.

GEAR UP with scores of powerful weapons, items and armor.

COLLECT NEW FIGHTERS and master each unique hero.

Blaze a path through DOZENS OF UNIQUE LEVELS

Face Off against KILLER BOSSES.

And GO FASTER to race your best times and climb the esports leaderboards.

-----------------
Jetpack Fighter is a swipe-to-attack high speed platformer with gear progression.

Play alone or challenge friends and other players on the leaderboards to see who is the fastest fighter around.

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your iTunes account.
- Network connection is required to play
- If you have a problem with this game, please contact us at: http://www.jetpackfighter.com/support
